channel.title: Need some help with my server >.>
channel.description: i use the testcape source and i followed the tut on making a server and i can get on my server and whatnot, however i cant make myself admin, i put it in the client.java and my char folder but i dont have the rights and cant use the commands that require the rights of admin. help please

item.title: Need some help with my server >.>
item.dc:creator: @Virtue Virtue
item.description:
@Virtue wrote:

i did that first time, i just looked again and it was reset to 0 and i just changed it back to 3 … lemme retry logging on and c if it works, thanks for the quick reply =)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 10, 2007, 07:40:17 PM[/size][hr]nope, still didnt work … i still cant use admin commands

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help with my server >.>

item.title: Need some help with my server >.>
item.dc:creator: @krixus krixus
item.description:
@krixus wrote:

Open the character folder and find your name.

Open it and search for this: character-rights = 0

Replace the 0 with a 3.

Read full topic
